game.name: Clan fantasy adventures
game.shortDescription: Clan fantasy adventures is a turn-based 2D RPG. Play Marco, a young boy who wants to become a swordsman, through various adventures that will plunge him into the heart of a major conflict.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Clan fantasy adventures is a turn-based 2D RPG. Play Marco, a young boy who wants to become a swordsman, through various adventures that will plunge him into the heart of a major conflict.
